overview: Don't let their innocence fool you, because theses schoolgirls are as naughty as they come! For over 2 hours, witness Alexis Monroe, Ella Milano, Shae Parker, and Jessica Nyx sharing their hottest private sexual encounters. Come and see what these little cuties have been hiding, because they're about to share all of their dirty little stories with you.
tagline: Don't let their innocence fool you
title: Dirty Little Schoolgirl Stories 5
